snippet: President Obama made one of his strongest pitches to date for the women’s vote, telling a mostly female crowd in Denver that Republicans would take them back to the era of the 1950s.
abstract: President Obama makes strong pitch in Denver for women's votes, telling a mostly female crowd that the Republican approach to health care would take them back to the era of the 1950s.

byline.original: By JACKIE CALMES and TRIP GABRIEL
byline.contributor: Jackie Calmes reported from Denver, and Trip Gabriel from Des Moines.

lead_paragraph: President Obama made one of his strongest pitches to date for the women’s vote, telling a mostly female crowd in Denver that Republicans would take them back to the era of the 1950s.

headline.main: Obama Assails Romney on Women’s Health Care
headline.print_headline: Obama Assails Romney on Women’s Health Care

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
